name: Tangle 04: Upraise
description:
When men are in trials, they should remain optimistic that the problems will end. At least men will find convenience along with the problems that come, keep that in mind! And when the men have realized that the universe has declared that all problems have been adjusted to their abilities, then the men will remain calm, and make the problem subservient to them.

If you think the ordeal will never end, then you are right! One problem that exists today, appears after the last problem is over, and the next problem will come along with the ability of the men to increase!

But remember that the universe is always with you, knowing what you don't know, and raising the level of men through any given problem.
